00036         static double spectrumPeakToHz(double peakNum, double sampleFrequency,
00037                                        unsigned int spectrumSize)
00038         {
00039             return sampleFrequency * peakNum / spectrumSize;
00040         }
00041 
00050         static double frameNumToMs(double frameNum, int frameLength,
00051                                    double frameOverlap)
00052         {
00053             return (1.0 - frameOverlap) * frameLength * frameNum;
00054         }
